1552480.name: Beach Buggy Racing 2: Hot Wheels™ Booster Pack
1552480.description:
Turbocharge your game with the Hot Wheels Booster Pack, an exciting new content expansion for Beach Buggy Racing 2: Island Adventure.

The Booster Pack adds seven legendary Hot Wheels cars to the Beach Buggy Racing League, including Rip Rod™, Bone Shaker™, Surf 'N Turf™, and Twin Mill™ III. You'll also get four new race environments filled with looping orange Hot Wheels track and exciting set pieces like Volcano Blast and Hot Wheels Harbor. Ready for a challenge? See if you can collect the 27 Hot Wheels Stunt Challenge Medallions placed throughout the 1000HP race tracks.

Bring the thrill of Hot Wheels cars and tracks to Beach Buggy Racing 2 with the Hot Wheels Booster Pack. Challenge accepted!

  • 7 legendary Hot Wheels cars: Rip Rod™, Surf 'N Turf™, Bone Shaker™, Twin Mill™ III, Donut Drifter™, Hotweiler™ and Loco Punk™.
  • 4 thrilling new Hot Wheels themed tracks: Volcano Blast, Hot Wheels Harbor, Looptastic, and Frostfire Vale.
  • Earn trophies in the new Hot Wheels Championship and Quick Events.
  • New Hot Wheels Cups added to the Adventure map.
  • A Hot Wheels Stunt Challenge added to every track in the game. Discover them all in 1000HP Race mode.
  • 4 new paints and 4 new decals for customizing your cars.
  • 6 new Achievements to unlock.

(Some listed content is unlocked through game play.)
1552480.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
